pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 0    $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive      $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Mushroom Fields $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Wheat     $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Theres a red and a brown variant. Shearing turns them to a $(thing)Cow$(). Mooshroom can be milked with a $(item)Bucket$() to get milk and with a $(item)Bowl$() to get $(item)Mushroom Stew$(). $(thing)Brown Mooshrooms$(), can produce $(item)Suspicious Stew$() if fed with a small flower.
$(n)Drops:$() 0-2 Leather, 1-3 Raw Beef, 1-3 Steak if killed with fire  $(n)XP:$() 1-3
